Params: {1: '1', 3: 'A group of disorderly Program Ghosts are attacking one another, blocking your way.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Program Ghosts that fought us before are killing one another now...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We can't move forth with them blocking our way, and we've still got more Program Ghosts behind us...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Guess we'll have to force our way through here...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's the only logical thing to do now. We can't afford to waste time here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This is it! We've broken our way through!", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Working together, the four of you make it past the Program Ghosts and arrive at a safer location.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Who knows if we'll need to fight again up ahead, but we have no choice except to keep moving.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '"Bianca" is most likely... just right up ahead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's go. Brace yourself. I've got a feeling that it's not going to be the smoothest ride.", 4: '3'}
